alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Meade, northeastern Custer and eastern Pennington Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 445 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Marcus to 4 miles southeast of Curlew Lake to Rapid Valley. Movement was south at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Rapid Valley, Box Elder and Curlew Lake around 450 PM MDT. New Underwood, Caputa and Rapid City Airport around 455 PM MDT. Wicksville around 500 PM MDT. Owanka and Thompson Butte around 505 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Folsom and Scenic. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 61 and 105. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
